info.title: Organization API
info.description: Activity Management and Billing System API

get.description: Retrieve all organizations. Requires JWT authentication.

schema.title: Response Get All Organizations Organizations Get

post.description:
Create a new organization.

- **name**: Organization name (required)
- **address**: Street address (required)
- **city**: City (optional)
- **zip**: Zip code (optional)
- **state**: State (optional)
- **phone**: Phone number (required)
- **email**: Email address (required)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

get.description: Retrieve a single organization by ID. Requires JWT authentication.

put.description: Update an existing organization. Only provided fields will be updated. Requires JWT authentication.

delete.description: Delete an organization by ID. Requires JWT authentication.

get.description: Retrieve all activities.

schema.title: Response Get All Activities Activities Get

post.description:
Create a new activity.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **name**: Activity name (required)
- **category_id**: Category ID (required)
- **description**: Activity description (optional)
- **default_fee**: Default fee amount (optional)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

get.description: Retrieve a single activity by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing activity.

- **activity_id**: Activity ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Activity Activities  Activity Id  Put
Response Delete Activity Activities  Activity Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all activities for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Activities By Organization Activities Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all trainers.

schema.title: Response Get All Trainers Trainers Get

post.description:
Create a new trainer.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **first_name**: First name (required)
- **last_name**: Last name (required)
- **phone**: Phone number (optional)
- **email**: Email address (optional)
- **hire_date**: Hire date (optional)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

get.description: Retrieve a single trainer by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing trainer.

- **trainer_id**: Trainer ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Trainer Trainers  Trainer Id  Put
Response Delete Trainer Trainers  Trainer Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all trainers for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Trainers By Organization Trainers Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all activity-trainer relationships.

schema.title: Response Get All Activity Trainers Activitytrainers Get

post.description:
Create a new activity-trainer relationship.

- **activity_id**: Activity ID (required)
- **trainer_id**: Trainer ID (required)
- **role**: Trainer role for this activity (optional)

get.description: Retrieve all trainers assigned to a specific activity.

schema.title: Response Get Trainers By Activity Activitytrainers Activity  Activity Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all activities assigned to a specific trainer.

schema.title: Response Get Activities By Trainer Activitytrainers Trainer  Trainer Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a specific activity-trainer relationship.

put.description:
Update an existing activity-trainer relationship.

- **activity_id**: Activity ID (required in URL)
- **trainer_id**: Trainer ID (required in URL)
- **role**: Trainer role (optional)

schema.title: Response Update Activity Trainer Activitytrainers  Activity Id   Trainer Id  Put
Response Delete Activity Trainer Activitytrainers  Activity Id   Trainer Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records.

schema.title: Response Get All Attendance Attendance Get

post.description:
Create a new attendance record.

- **session_id**: Session ID (required)
- **enrollment_id**: Enrollment ID (required)
- **status**: Attendance status (required)
- **marked_at**: Timestamp when marked (required)
- **marked_by**: User ID who marked attendance (optional)

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records for a specific session.

schema.title: Response Get Attendance By Session Attendance Session  Session Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records for a specific enrollment.

schema.title: Response Get Attendance By Enrollment Attendance Enrollment  Enrollment Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single attendance record by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing attendance record.

- **attendance_id**: Attendance ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Attendance Attendance  Attendance Id  Put

delete.description: Delete an attendance record by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Attendance Attendance  Attendance Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all students.

schema.title: Response Get All Students Students Get

post.description:
Create a new student.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **first_name**: First name (required)
- **last_name**: Last name (required)
- **dob**: Date of birth (optional)
- **guardian_name**: Guardian name (optional)
- **guardian_phone**: Guardian phone (optional)
- **guardian_email**: Guardian email (optional)
- **notes**: Additional notes (optional)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

get.description: Retrieve all students for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Students By Organization Students Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single student by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing student.

- **student_id**: Student ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Student Students  Student Id  Put
Response Delete Student Students  Student Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all batches.

schema.title: Response Get All Batches Batches Get

post.description:
Create a new batch.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **activity_id**: Activity ID (required)
- **fee_plan_id**: Fee Plan ID (required)
- **name**: Batch name (required)
- **start_date**: Start date (required)
- **end_date**: End date (optional)
- **capacity**: Batch capacity (optional)
- **location**: Location (optional)
- **status**: Batch status (required)

get.description: Retrieve all batches for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Batches By Organization Batches Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all batches for a specific activity.

schema.title: Response Get Batches By Activity Batches Activity  Activity Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single batch by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing batch.

- **batch_id**: Batch ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Batch Batches  Batch Id  Put
Response Delete Batch Batches  Batch Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all batch sessions.

schema.title: Response Get All Batch Sessions Batchsessions Get

post.description:
Create a new batch session.

- **batch_id**: Batch ID (required)
- **session_date**: Session date (required)
- **start_time**: Start time (required)
- **end_time**: End time (required)
- **status**: Session status (required)
- **notes**: Session notes (optional)

schema.title: Response Create Batch Session Batchsessions Post

get.description: Retrieve all sessions for a specific batch.

schema.title: Response Get Sessions By Batch Batchsessions Batch  Batch Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single batch session by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing batch session.

- **session_id**: Session ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Batch Session Batchsessions  Session Id  Put

delete.description: Delete a batch session by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Batch Session Batchsessions  Session Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all categories.

schema.title: Response Get All Categories Categories Get

post.description:
Create a new category.

- **name**: Category name (required)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

get.description: Retrieve a single category by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing category.

- **category_id**: Category ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Category Categories  Category Id  Put
Response Delete Category Categories  Category Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all fee plans.

schema.title: Response Get All Fee Plans Feeplans Get

post.description:
Create a new fee plan.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **name**: Fee plan name (required)
- **billing_type**: Billing type (required)
- **amount**: Fee amount (required)
- **currency**: Currency code (3 chars, required)
- **active**: Active status (default: true)

schema.title: Response Create Fee Plan Feeplans Post

get.description: Retrieve all fee plans for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Fee Plans By Organization Feeplans Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single fee plan by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing fee plan.

- **fee_plan_id**: Fee Plan ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Fee Plan Feeplans  Fee Plan Id  Put

delete.description: Delete a fee plan by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Fee Plan Feeplans  Fee Plan Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all invoices.

schema.title: Response Get All Invoices Invoices Get

post.description:
Create a new invoice.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **enrollment_id**: Enrollment ID (required)
- **invoice_date**: Invoice date (required)
- **due_date**: Due date (required)
- **total_amount**: Total invoice amount (required)
- **status**: Invoice status (required)

get.description: Retrieve all invoices for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Invoices By Organization Invoices Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all invoices for a specific enrollment.

schema.title: Response Get Invoices By Enrollment Invoices Enrollment  Enrollment Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single invoice by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing invoice.

- **invoice_id**: Invoice ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Invoice Invoices  Invoice Id  Put
Response Delete Invoice Invoices  Invoice Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all payments.

schema.title: Response Get All Payments Payments Get

post.description:
Create a new payment.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **invoice_id**: Invoice ID (required)
- **payment_date**: Payment date (required)
- **amount**: Payment amount (required)
- **method**: Payment method (required)
- **reference_no**: Payment reference number (optional)
- **notes**: Payment notes (optional)

get.description: Retrieve all payments for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Payments By Organization Payments Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve all payments for a specific invoice.

schema.title: Response Get Payments By Invoice Payments Invoice  Invoice Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single payment by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing payment.

- **payment_id**: Payment ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Payment Payments  Payment Id  Put
Response Delete Payment Payments  Payment Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all roles.

schema.title: Response Get All Roles Roles Get

post.description:
Create a new role.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **name**: Role name (required)

get.description: Retrieve all roles for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Roles By Organization Roles Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a single role by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing role.

- **role_id**: Role ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update Role Roles  Role Id  Put
Response Delete Role Roles  Role Id  Delete

get.description: Retrieve all users.

schema.title: Response Get All Users Users Get

post.description:
Create a new user. Requires JWT authentication.

- **org_id**: Organization ID (required)
- **role_id**: Role ID (required)
- **email**: Email address (required)
- **phone**: Phone number (optional)
- **password_hash**: Hashed password (optional)
- **active**: User status (required)

get.description: Retrieve all users for a specific organization.

schema.title: Response Get Users By Organization Users Organization  Org Id  Get

get.description: Retrieve a user by email address.
Retrieve a single user by ID.

put.description:
Update an existing user.

- **user_id**: User ID (required in URL)
- All other fields are optional

schema.title: Response Update User Users  User Id  Put
Response Delete User Users  User Id  Delete

put.description: Update the last login timestamp for a user.

schema.title: Response Update Last Login Users  User Id  Last Login Put

post.description:
Authenticate user with email and password. Returns JWT token if credentials are valid.

- **email**: User email address (required)
- **password**: User password in plain text (will be hashed and compared with SHA256) (required)

get.description: Health check endpoint

Protected endpoint - requires valid JWT token in Authorization header.
Example: Authorization: Bearer <your_jwt_token>

role.title: Role
role.description: Role of trainer for this activity

role.title: Role
role.description: Role of trainer for this activity

Bearer.description: Enter JWT token obtained from /users/authenticate/login endpoint
